Literature.Title: Specifically targeted antimicrobial peptides synergize with bacterial-entrapping peptide against systemic MRSA infections.
Literature.Author: Xu B, Wang L, Yang C, Yan R, Zhang P, Jin M, Du H, Wang Y

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:10% Hemolysis=>256 µg/ml,Human embryonic kidney HEK293T cells:10% Cell death=>256 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=16µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus USA 300(MIC=64µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=>256µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(MIC=128µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=64µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 15442(MIC=>256µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=128µg/ml)
